SA01n760:918: yadi khalu kṣīre dadhyādayo vikārāḥ santi bīje cāṅkurādayaḥ śukraśoni(ṇi)
SA01n760:921: yathā ca na yujyate tathā pūrvamevāviṣkṛtam |
SA01n760:922: vaiśeṣiko manyate-kapāleṣvavidyamānaṃ ghaṭadravyaṃ tantuṣu cāvidyamānaṃ paṭadravyaṃ kapālatantusaṃyogādutpadyate |
SA01n760:929: na hi mukhyasattā[yāṃ] guṇābhāve'vayavābhāve vā kāraṇeṣu prāgutpattyabhāve vā kāryasattopacāro yujyate ||
SA01n760:932: tadyathā madhuravāgdevadatta iti vāci mādhuryaguṇayuktasya guḍadravyasya madhuno vā sādharmyamabhilaṣaṇīyatā vidyate ityato vāci mādhuryaśabdaḥ prayujyate |
SA01n760:933: kanyāmukhe ca candrakāntisādṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭvā candraśabdaḥ prayujyate |
SA01n760:934: vāhīke ca jāḍyasādharmyādgośabdaḥ prayujyate-gaurayaṃ vāhīka ityevamādi |
SA01n760:935: na ca tathā kaścidaguṇāvayavagandho'pi tantuṣu tatsaṃyoge vā prāgutpattyabhāve nirātmanaḥ kāryasyāstīti |
SA01n760:938: prāgavyapadeśyaṃ vastumātraṃ viprakṛtaṃ jāyata iti cet | na |
SA01n760:961: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām ||
SA01n760:962: iha khalu bhavatāmahetuko vināśaḥ sarvotpattimatāṃ nityasaṃnihitaḥ |
SA01n760:963: tasmiṃśca sati janmasthitiśaktikriyā na vidyante, virodhāt |
SA01n760:966: tadasminnasati kiṃ pratītya asannirātmakaṃ vastu vastutāṃ yātītyācakṣva |
SA01n760:970: kathaṃ tarhi sa bhāvo naṣṭa ityucyate ?
SA01n760:980: yatkhalu nisvabhāvaṃ nirātmakaṃ hetūnpratītya jāyate tasya khalu svabhāvo nāsti |
SA01n760:981: na hi tatkāraṇeṣu pratyekamavasthitaṃ nāpi bhāgaśo nāpyanyatra kvacit |
SA01n760:983: yacca na kvacidasti tatkatamena svabhāvenotpatsyata iti nāsti svabhāvaḥ |
SA01n760:990: tasya tarhi hetavo vidyamānasya kamupakāraṃ kurvantīti ?
SA01n760:992: na khalu dravyasvabhāvāstitvaṃ prati kañcidupakāraṃ kurvanti |
SA01n760:993: na ca svabhāvasyāpekṣya prajñaptiḥ | kiṃ tarhi ?
SA01n760:996: tadyathā'bhijātasya rājaputrasya vidyamānasya mantriṇaḥ sabalasamudayāḥ parigrahānugrahamātreṇopakurvanto rājatvaṃ kurvantyevamanāgatasya vastunaḥ sato hetupratyayāḥ sametya lakṣaṇamātra(traṃ)
SA01n760:1006: tathā kāraṇasāmagrye sati dharmāṇāṃ kriyāsāmarthyamupajāyata iti draṣṭavyam |
SA01n760:1013: yastu manyate'tītaṃ karmābhāvībhavatyanāgataṃ ca na vidyate taṃ pratyapadiśyate-
SA01n760:1019: atra pratyavatiṣṭhante dārṣṭāntikāḥ-na brūmaḥ sarvathā'tītaṃ na vidyate |
SA01n760:1020: kiṃ tarhi ? dravyātmanā na vidyate prajñaptyātmanā tu saditi |
SA01n760:1027: yadi tarhyanāgataṃ cakṣurādidravyaṃ vidyate kasmānna paśyati na dṛśyate na vijānāti ?
SA01n760:1034: dṛṣṭaṃ hi pradīpādyaṅgavaikalye vartamānasyāpi cakṣuṣo rūpādarśanam |
SA01n760:1039: tatra keṣāñcidasāṃnidhyaṃ bhavati tadvaikalyātkāritraṃ na karotīti |
SA01n760:1046: chātrāsanamadhyāsya na hi sarvajñapravacanagāmbhīryaṃ sadevakenāpi lokena śakyaṃ tarkamātreṇāvaboddhum |
SA01n760:1052: anāgatasya khalu dharmasya vartamānādhvasaṃpātādantaraṅgavahiraṅgasāmagryāṅgaparigrahāt labdhasāmarthyasya dharmasya yaḥ phalākṣepastatkāritramityucyate |
SA01n760:1054: tatra yo brūte'nanyatkāritramiti tasya dravyasvabhāvaparityāgaḥ prasajyate ||
SA01n760:1058: yadi dravyātmano nānyathātvaṃ kiṃ tarhi hetū[n] pratītya jāyate ? brūmaḥ-
SA01n760:1060: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā ||
SA01n760:1074: te khalvete bhavatkalpitāstrayaḥ svabhāvāḥ pūrvameva pratyūḍhāḥ |
SA01n760:1083: yasmi vā vastuni saṃyukto'prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastu ?
SA01n760:1085: syādvastuni saṃyukto na ca tadvastvaprahīṇaṃ yathā tāvaddarśanamārge |
SA01n760:1087: duḥkhajñāne utpanne samudayajñāne cānutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ vastu prahīṇaṃ bhavati |
SA01n760:1093: navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yo yaḥ prakāraḥ pūrva prahīṇastasminprahīṇe'pi śeṣaistadavalambibhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto vijñātavyaḥ ||
SA01n760:1097: tata eva [ta]dvispaṣṭaṃ gamyate-amuṣminvastuni iyanto'nuśayā anuśerata iti |
SA01n760:1102: dharmāstāvat kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu pratyekaṃ pañcaprakārā duḥkhādidarśanaheyā apraheyāśca nirmalā iti ṣoḍaśa bhavanti |
SA01n760:1114: kasya vijñānasya katame dharmā gocarā iti ?
SA01n760:1118: kāmāvacarāḥ khalu duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyā dharmāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcānāṃ vijñānānāṃ gocarībhavanti |
SA01n760:1125: ekasya ca rūpāptasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ceti |
SA01n760:1130: rupāvacaro hi duḥkhadarśa[na]prahātavyo dharmaḥ aṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam |
SA01n760:1135: bhāvanāprahātavyasya ca kuśalasya ūrdhvaikasyārūpyāvacarasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ca |
SA01n760:1159: traidhātukānāṃ pañcānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ye'ntyāstrayaḥ prakārā ṇi(ni)
SA01n760:1170: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ dharmāṇāmetāni ṣoḍaśacittāni traidhātukāni pañcaprakārānya(ṇya)
SA01n760:1184: avyākṛtasya tu vipākajasya manobhaumasya sukhasaumanasyopekṣāsaṃprayuktasyānāsravasya ca duḥkhadharmajñānasamudayadharmajñānatatkṣāntisaṃprayuktasya vijñānasya |
SA01n760:1191: rūpāvacare tvakliṣṭe kāmāvacaradharma gocarā eva rūpāvacarāḥ sarvatragāḥ,
SA01n760:1193: [333] catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ |
SA01n760:1239: caturthe'pi khalu mārgadarśanaheye vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo mārgadarśaṇa(na)
SA01n760:1242: parivṛtte tu khalu vijñāne kāmāvacarāścatvāro ṇi(ni)
SA01n760:1248: rūpāpte prathame'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ ||
SA01n760:1250: rūpāvacare prathame khalu vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo duḥkhasamudayavisabhāgadhātvālambanāḥ saṃprayogataḥ |
SA01n760:1322: cakṣurindriye khalu bhāvanāheyāḥ sarvatragāścānuśayāḥ kāmāvacararūpāvacarā anuśerate |
SA01n760:1323: evaṃ yāvatkāyendriye cakṣurdhātau rūpadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātau yāvadvistareṇa kāyavijñānadhātau yāvadrūpaskandhe vācyam ||
SA01n760:1349: tatrāpi sarvatragasaṃprayukte cetasi asarvatragā vardhanta iti trayo bhavanti |
SA01n760:1355: [347] duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ |
SA01n760:1374: tatra yathāyogaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtāvalambanāḥ,
SA01n760:1377: tatpunaḥ sukhendriyālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ yasya cittasyālambanaṃ taccittaṃ sukhendriyā lambanālambanam |
SA01n760:1379: tatkhalu sukhendriyālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ cittaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam ?
SA01n760:1380: tasyaiva ca dvādaśavidhasyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudaya[darśana] prahātavyasya |
SA01n760:1382: tatrārūpyāvacarau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāśca catvāro nikāyāḥ,
SA01n760:1387: manaindriye khalu sarvatraidhātukāḥ ye'pi te nirvāṇālambanāste'pi saṃprayogataḥ |
SA01n760:1396: adhunā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ kasya cittasya samanantaraṃ kati cittānyutpadyanta ityupadiśyante(te) |
SA01n760:1398: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā ||
SA01n760:1402: ścyutvā rūpadhātāvupapadyate tasya tatratyāni pañca bhavanti |
SA01n760:1406: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa ||
SA01n760:1423: tatra kliṣṭaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sānuśayaṃ yadaprahīna(ṇa)kleśam |
SA01n760:1425: tatra kliṣṭaṃ cittamanuśayaiḥ saṃprayuktairaprahīṇaiḥ sānuśayaṃ tadālambanaiścāprahīṇaiḥ |
SA01n760:1426: kathamiha yo'nuśayo yena cittena saṃprayuktaḥ sa khalvaprahīna(ṇa)
SA01n760:1428: yāvaddhi tadanuśayānuprāptiviśeṣeṇa sā cittasantatiravaṣṭabdhā cādhiṣṭhitā ca bhavati,
SA01n760:1429: niṣyandaphalasya cānāgatasya tasyāṃ cittasantatau sabhāgaheturutpattaye kṛtāspado bhavati,
SA01n760:1431: tasya punaḥ kleśāśīviṣasya prāptidraṃṣṭrāvabhaṅge kṛte vidyamāno'pi san kleśastasmiṃścetasyanarthānutpādanāt sannapi saṃprayogataḥ nānuśeta ityucyate |
SA01n760:1434: na tu kadācinmuñjeśīkāvaduddhṛtya śakyate tasmāt kleśaḥ cittātpṛthakkartuṃ nirnāśayituṃ vā svālambanādvā vimukhīkartum |
SA01n760:1435: uktaṃ hi- “yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ kadācitsa dharmastasya dharmasya nālambanam ?
SA01n760:1445: tayā ca satkāyadṛṣṭyā tatsaṃprayuktayā cāvidyayā sahāyabhāvena cānuśayāne ca sānuśayam |
SA01n760:1473: iha tāvad bālasya pañcopādānaskandhātmake duḥkhe saṃmugdhasya phalabhūtā[n] pañcopādānaskandhānajānataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirūpajāyate |
SA01n760:1476: tasyaivaṃ bhavati-yadi tāvadayaṃ nityo'vikārī puruṣaḥ kiṃ dharmeṇa yaḥ sukhena nānugṛhyate,
SA01n760:1484: ’ tasya khalu mithyādarśanabhūtagrahāvedha śādaśreyasi śreyobuddhyā pravṛttasyānagra(gre)
SA01n760:1485: cāgryabuddhyabhiniviṣṭasya svapakṣe rāgo bhavati parapakṣe ca dveṣaḥ pravartate |
SA01n760:1490: kalyāṇamitrapāpamitrasaṃsargāddhi prāyeṇa śraddhādīnāṃ guṇānāmeṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ samu[dā]cārapravṛttiḥ ācāryāṇāmabhimateti |
SA01n760:1504: atha ya ime bhagavatā traya āsravā ākhyātāḥ- “kāmāsravo bhavāsravo'vidyāsravaśca |
SA01n760:1507: [360] vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ |
SA01n760:1536: apaharanti śleṣayanti ca tathaivaikākinyo'pi dṛṣṭaya iti |
SA01n760:1551: tatra kāmayoga eva sahā'vidyayā kāmopādānaṃ catustriṃśad dravyāṇi |
SA01n760:1586: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ dve dṛṣṭī |
SA01n760:1587: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ pṛthaguktam ?
SA01n760:1601: tadyathā-satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti |
SA01n760:1603: avarā hi kāmadhātūretāni ca tadanuguṇāni | yasmāt
SA01n760:1610: yadā khalu strotaāpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇe ṣaṭ kleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayānā(-traya)
SA01n760:1615: pravartakagrahaṇe khalu pravartyamapi gahītaṃ bhavati pradīpālokavat |
SA01n760:1629: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ khalu sarvānarthamalānāṃ kleśasya ca bhavatrayasya ca mūlam |
SA01n760:1631: mārgasya ca sadbhūtasya pratyarthibhūtaḥ kumārgāvalambī śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ |
SA01n760:1639: yathā khalu trayo'ntarāyā mārgagamane bhavantyagantukāmatā'nyamārgagrahaṇaṃ mārgabahutvasaṃdehācca mārgagamanāpratipattiḥ |
SA01n760:1644: vicikitsā mārgasaṃśaye sati mārgāpratipatti[ritye]ṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ strotaāpannasya dyotayadbhagavānkleśatrayasyaiva grahaṇamakārṣīditi ||
SA01n760:1667: ete ca trayo mūlakleśāḥ ṣaḍvijñānabhaumāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ |
SA01n760:1672: tatra gṛhī abhidhyayā viṣayeṣu grathitastadvyāghātakartṛṣu vivādamārabhamāno dveṣeṇānubadhyate |
SA01n760:1678: ye tāvatkhalu kleśā upakleśā api te cittopakleśanāt |
SA01n760:1680: ye'pi cānye caitasikāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāḥ te'pyupakleśā ityākhyāyante ||
SA01n760:1681: ke punaste kleśamalāḥ kāni vā paryavasthānāni ?
SA01n760:1721: yaduta-ahrīkyauddhatyamadamātsaryakuhanālapanānaimittikatānaiṣpeśikatā lābhena lābhasya niścikīrṣatā pāpecchatā mahecchatecchasvitā kāmajñātijanapadavitarkapāpamitratādayaḥ |
SA01n760:1793: atha kaḥ kleśaḥ kayā vedanayā saṃprayujyate ?
SA01n760:1837: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca ||
